Even after all these moons of pining, that cute blush has still gotta be number one on my list of favorite sights.
cool_mate1: [You decide to prank your mate, t_c, by claiming that one of your clanmates made a pass at you.]
[t_c looks genuinely hurt. Whoa ... You weren't expecting that reaction!]
[Maybe t_c isn't actually as unshakable as they seem?]
[Or, maybe you're just an extra touchy subject.]
cool_insult: Tough talk, from a cat with a face like that.
cool_insult2: Are you lashing out to compensate for your abnormally large nose?
stable_17: y_c, seriously? That's where you're going to sit??? That's my spot, it always has been!
No- no! I don't want to hear your excuses! You should know better!
Now, with all due respect, please move.
stable_18: [You watch as t_c flicks their tail behind them, swatting at the bugs that infest their nest]!
SHOO! GO AWAY! YOU WILL BOTHER ME NO MORE! I SHAN'T HAVE IT! THERE WILL BE NO BUGS HITHER!
[A small fly buzzes up from the nest and lands softly onto t_c's nose. They pause for a second and stare at it, their brows begin to crease in a furious rage. They swipe at it and leap into the air!]
NOOOOO! LEAVE ME ALONE YOU BACKBONE SHELL! STARCLAN GIVE ME PEACE!
stable_19: Hello y_c, looking sharp as always! What am I doing? Oh, I'm just looking up at the clouds, they're funny aren't they? How they move, shift and morph... It's beautiful...
See that one there, it looks like a bird! That one there, a twoleg! And that one, it almost looks like a monster, but one of the bigger ones, you know the sturdy looking ones.
They move so slowly and effortlessly, like the world can just wait for them. Huh, I wonder what that's like. Must be nice...
genparent_toadult02: Here, y_c, let me help you get your favorite prey from the top of the freshkill pi -- oop!
[t_c stops in their tracks as you stretch to the top of the pile and easily fetch the prey you want.]
Since when have you been big enough to do that?!
You better stop growing up so fast, y_c! Or else you're gonna be bigger than me before I know it!
gen_secret: Hello, y_c! Wanna come sit with me?
[You sit next to them. They pause for a second, looking at you.]
Whenever we talk, I feel like there's a lot more going on inside you than you ever let anyone see.
brave_condition: [t_c blinks their eyes open at the sound of your pawsteps, trying weakly to raise their head.]
Come to visit the sick patient, huh? I must look in pretty rough shape.
It's okay, though. You don't have to stay with me.
I ... I promise I'm not scared.
[t_c smiles, putting on a brave face, but their eyes shine with a terror beyond their moons.]
brooding_love01: y_c, you're such a nice cat.
You always take the time out of your day to come and talk to me ... Check up on me ... Spend time with me ...
But, you're also a smart cat.
Smart enough to know that 'nice' gets you eaten alive out here in the wild.
I lost any semblance of 'nice' a long time ago. It was what I had to do to survive. But, somehow, you've managed to hold onto that part of yourself ...
You're a really special cat, y_c. I hope you never change.
brooding_mentor4: [t_c just got done absolutely drilling you in a brutal training session.]
[You're about to slink back to your nest, defeated, when you overhear them talking with r_c across camp.]
They're sloppy and green. Too hard on themself ... No one's gonna take them seriously.
That's how my mentor described me as an apprentice. I hope y_c never has to feel that way.
The kid is coming into their own so fast ... I can barely keep up.
A smart little cat, that one is.
[They smile and shake their head, forcing you to dart out of earshot before they can catch you eavesdropping.]
brooding_mentor: Hello, y_c. Today, we are going to be practicing our scruff shake.
It's a serious tactic, so be sure to treat it as such. This is our Clanmates' lives and deaths, not a silly game.
[You try your best to heed t_c's words ...]
[... But you don't know how they don't crack even a hint of a smile when you're shaking them back and forth by the scruff.]
brooding_mentor1: [t_c drops a pile of mouse-bile at your paws.]
The elders are complaining about ticks. Go see that they're made comfortable.
And I don't want to hear a word of complaint, either. In c_nClan, our elders are to be respected.
brooding_mentor2: [Sigh ... Of course, just your luck that you'd end up with the most brooding, impersonable cat in the Clan as your mentor.]
[t_c catches you staring at them from across camp and narrows their eyes.]
y_c, what are you doing lazing around? Get to work!
[Is it too late to ask l_n to get switched to someone nicer?]
brooding_mentor3: [t_c catches you staring at them from across camp and smiles.]
[t_c might be one of the most brooding, impersonable cats in the Clan, sure ... But you can't help but respect them as a mentor.]
upstanding_general6: Have you ever had the feeling where you want to achieve something so much, to the point that you feel like you're going to explode?

upstanding_general9: Keep up the good work y_c! Always remember to go that extra mile!
